text: <@U7ADCU3BM> I just got around to testing this and can confirm that your solution works. BIG THANKS for your help! :beers:
what sorcery are you guys doing with custom modules / the CM API if you don’t mind me asking?

I’m looking at the <https://designers.HubSpot.com/inspire> site and notice that the ‘submit your cos sites’ button isnt working. Can you no longer add anything? Is there a new process to add sites to this page? Not sure if someone form HubSpot could clarify :slightly_smiling_face:
Hey <@U7BEP5R7T> I missed this notification for some crazy work load I had.  What was going on with this again?
console error vex is not defined

Are you using an integration to get more contact info on your current leads? The integration or manual setup would be something like this: Your leads come in and the integration captures the email address and then verifies and brings in data from other sources such as linkedin or hoovers providing you more detailed information for your lead.  If you are doing somethign like this, what company is this?

I am not really using the API but I really would like to start to use :slightly_smiling_face: 
Can you share some flows you have?
If so, I can build a collection of  request in postman or something like that :slightly_smiling_face:
yeah, it’s a test embed of the meetings forms. I’m using the form module and trying to select a meetings form through it. Doesn’t seem to work.

I'll take a look at this. In the mean-time feel free to send me an email if you have one.

Details I need:
- Site URL
- Quote
- Headshot
- Name/Title
- if there's any animation on the page, you will also have to provide desktop/mobile screenshots
Also, it's worth noting... we're not listing every page that gets submitted anymore. We are being a bit selective and featuring beautiful/unique sites.
So just to be clear, a submission does not necessarily mean that it will get posted.

I'd like to see the inspire gallery go more towards the way <https://www.awwwards.com/> does it. Let sites be submitted and then a jury (which can be pulled from either select agency partners or HS employees) rates the sites based on criteria. Then some can get "website of the month" banners and such

Has anyone implemented Drift links properly in HubSpot via a normal link or a CTA button where it does NOT reload the page first? Drift said everything is implemented properly and they assume it's a HubSpot CMS issue??
<@U26C29XPH> hit me up, from what I understand that won't work with CTA's
I wondered that. I'll message you!
they redirect to a tracking url and then back.
~Howdy folks! Can you please tell me if there is a way to read the value of the repeater inside the module?~ Nevermind, reread the loop sections of Hubl
has anyone else seen issues with images in the file manager?
the image files show but the images show as broken and result in a 403 error
<@U26D0TF8E> Have you uploaded those images with the file manager or an FTP client?
I believe it was either the file manager or the template clone
is there a way to check if it was FTP?
a 403 error makes me think about permissions
so perhaps a different "owner" copied those files
is there a way to change/fix it?
I am pretty sure we could see them yesterday when they were uploaded so not sure what changed since then
I have no further ideas... I'm not very versed in server management
no worries...thanks for the assist!
Can you send me an example?
hey <@U22PWJ41G> sorry just seeing your comment...I pin pointed the issue to the name of the folder
somehow it had been updated to be blank (?)
Interesting
so the file paths were showing them as in the main file manager folder...which they weren't
Update: button is fixed on the site <@U7AU6414J>
I like that idea, <@U2H3TT8F2>. To be totally transparent we don't have any plans at the moment to overhaul Inspire, but it's something I've been thinking about alittle bit.
Thanks <@U22PU4G4A>!

How do you do to custom the hover of a CTA ?
With the older version we had the class of the CTA so it was easier
